bill_title: require that home studies conducted for custody determinations be completed by certain professionals.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require that home studies conducted for custody determinations be completed by certain professionals. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 25-4 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any home study conducted for purposes of determining custody of a minor shall be completed by one of the following persons: (1) A licensed professional counselor or licensed professional counselor-mental health licensed pursuant to chapter 36-32; (2) A marriage and family therapist licensed pursuant to chapter 36-33; (3) A psychologist licensed pursuant to chapter 36-27A; or (4) A certified social worker licensed pursuant to chapter 36-26. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.04 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require that home studies conducted for custody determinations be completed by certain professionals. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 25-4 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any home study conducted for purposes of determining custody of a minor shall be completed by one of the following persons: (1) A licensed professional counselor or licensed professional counselor-mental health licensed pursuant to chapter 36-32; (2) A marriage and family therapist licensed pursuant to chapter 36-33; (3) A psychologist licensed pursuant to chapter 36-27A; (4) A certified social worker licensed pursuant to chapter 36-26; or (5) Any other person that a court may deem appropriate. However, the provisions of this section do not apply to any home study conducted pursuant to chapters 26-7A, 26-8A, 26-8B, and 26-8C.
